alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 22 at 1:30PM MST until November 25 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THURSDAY TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Central and eastern Laramie County in Wyoming. Scotts Bluff and Banner Counties in Nebraska. * WHEN...From 5 PM Thursday to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact holiday travel.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County
